alert.note: Alert for Brown; Greene; Jackson; Lawrence; Martin; Monroe (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 19 at 4:14PM EDT until April 20 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM EDT THURSDAY FOR CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS IN PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN INDIANA... The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a Red Flag Warning for critical fire weather conditions, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM EDT Thursday. * AFFECTED AREA...portions of southern Indiana including Brown, Greene, Lawrence, Jackson, Martin, and Monroe counties. * TIMING...Noon until 8 PM EDT on Thursday * WINDS...South 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the low 80s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended. Never throw cigarettes out of a vehicle.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Greene; Jackson; Lawrence; Martin; Monroe
